name: G+ Material Dark
description: G+ in dark. Using the design colors provided by Google @ https://www.google.com/design/spec/style/color.html#color-themes
additional_info:
G+ Material Dark

  • Its dark
  • Super small at only 2.1K
    • Optimized and Minified for speed
  • Only overrides colors

This theme is for “New G+ interface” Please let me know if I have missed any elements!

For a better experience install stylus! http://add0n.com/stylus.html Stylus is a fork of Stylish that is based on the source code of version 1.5.2, which was the most up-to-date version before the original developer stopped working on the project. The objective in creating Stylus was to remove any and all analytics, and return to a more user-friendly UI. We recognize that the ability to transfer your database from Stylish is important, so this is the one and only feature we've implemented from the new version.
